name: Potato Bread Loaf
description: A delicious potato bread loaf made with mashed potato. So easy and delicious, this bread is great for everyday sandwiches and toast. Vegan Recipe.
recipeIngredient: 1  medium sized potato boiled and mashed
2/3 cup potato water ((water in which I boiled the potato))

recipeInstructions.text: In a small bowl, add 1/4 cup (60ml) warm potato water and yeast and 1 teaspoon sugar and mix well. Wait until the mixture becomes frothy. 10 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: In a small bowl, add 1/4 cup (60ml) warm potato water and yeast and 1 teaspoon sugar and mix well. Wait until the mixture becomes frothy. 10 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Grease the mixer bowl and add the flours, oil, salt and mashed potato and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Grease the mixer bowl and add the flours, oil, salt and mashed potato and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the yeast mixture and the remaining potato water and knead for 8-10 minutes (batches of 3 minutes) Add more flour or water if required.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the yeast mixture and the remaining potato water and knead for 8-10 minutes (batches of 3 minutes) Add more flour or water if required.

recipeInstructions.text: The dough should leave the sides and be soft ant not sticky.
recipeInstructions.name: The dough should leave the sides and be soft ant not sticky.

recipeInstructions.text: Place dough in well greased container covered in a warm place for an hour to 80 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Place dough in well greased container covered in a warm place for an hour to 80 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Punch the dough down and use some flour to knead it to make it less sticky.
recipeInstructions.name: Punch the dough down and use some flour to knead it to make it less sticky.

recipeInstructions.text: Shape the loaf by pulling on all sides and tucking under and place in well greased bread pan.
recipeInstructions.name: Shape the loaf by pulling on all sides and tucking under and place in well greased bread pan.

recipeInstructions.text: Cover with a kitchen towel and let rise for 40 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Cover with a kitchen towel and let rise for 40 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake at 375 degrees F for 35-40 minutes or until the bread looks nice and brown and sounds hollow.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake at 375 degrees F for 35-40 minutes or until the bread looks nice and brown and sounds hollow.

recipeInstructions.text: Cool completely before slicing! and Enjoy the roasty potato taste!
recipeInstructions.name: Cool completely before slicing! and Enjoy the roasty potato taste!

keywords: everyday bread recipe, potato loaf, vegan bread recipe
